level.heading: ACCESS TO PROGRAM AND FINANCIAL INFORMATION (ยง 29-216)

level.text: Each vendor shall be provided access to all program and financial data of the Department relevant to the operation of the Program, including quarterly and annual financial reports, if that disclosure does not violate applicable federal or District laws pertaining to the disclosure of confidential information.

Insofar as practicable, data shall be made available in braille or recorded tape and, at the request of the vendor, the Department shall arrange a convenient time to assist in the interpretation of data.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: DCRR Title 6C, as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 27 DCR 4611 (October 17, 1980).
